languages.text: "В любом случае я должен использовать эту возможность и постараться выяснить, что культ делал на {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриальном мире{/g} и чем именно их заинтересовала планета, полная священных машин и слуг {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. Для начала — найти кого-то, кто может ввести нас в курс дела..." {n}Хейнрикс прислушивается.{/n} "...если здесь еще остался кто-то, с кем можно поговорить".

traits.locale_text: "В любом случае я должен использовать эту возможность и постараться выяснить, что Культ делал на индустриальном мире и чем именно их заинтересовала планета, полная священных машин и слуг {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. Для начала — найти кого-то, кто может ввести нас в курс дела..." {n}Хейнрикс прислушивается.{/n} "...если здесь еще остался кто-то, с кем можно поговорить".

languages.text: "Nevertheless, I must use this opportunity and try to determine what the cult was doing on an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} and what specifically interested them on a planet full of sacred machines and servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. First, we must find someone who can tell us what's been going on here..." {n}Heinrix pauses, straining to hear something.{/n} "...if, that is, there is anyone left here to speak to."
languages.original_text: "В любом случае я должен использовать эту возможность и постараться выяснить, что культ делал на {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}индустриальном мире{/g} и чем именно их заинтересовала планета, полная священных машин и слуг {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. Для начала — найти кого-то, кто может ввести нас в курс дела..." {n}Хейнрикс прислушивается.{/n} "...если здесь еще остался кто-то, с кем можно поговорить".

traits.locale_text: "Nevertheless, I must use this opportunity and try to determine what the Cult was doing on an industrial world and what specifically interested them on a planet full of sacred machines and servants of the Omnissiah. First, we must find someone who can tell us what's been going on here..." {n}Heinrix pauses, straining to hear something.{/n} "...if, that is, there is anyone left here to speak to."

"Nevertheless, I must use this opportunity and try to determine what the Cult was doing on an industrial world and what specifically interested them on a planet full of sacred machines and servants of the Omnissiah. First, we must find someone who can tell us what's been going on here..." {n}Heinrix pauses, straining to hear something.{/n} "...if, that is, there is anyone left here to speak to."

"Nevertheless, I must use this opportunity and try to determine what the Cult was doing on an industrial world and what specifically interested them on a planet full of sacred machines and servants of the Omnissiah. First, we must find someone who can tell us what's been going on here..." {n}Heinrix pauses, straining to hear something.{/n} "...if, that is, there is anyone left here to speak to."

"Nevertheless, I must use this opportunity and try to determine what the Cult was doing on an industrial world and what specifically interested them on a planet full of sacred machines and servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. First, we must find someone who can tell us what's been going on here..." {n}Heinrix pauses, straining to hear something.{/n} "...if, that is, there is anyone left here to speak to."

"Nevertheless, I must use this opportunity and try to determine what the Cult was doing on an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} and what specifically interested them on a planet full of sacred machines and servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. First, we must find someone who can tell us what's been going on here..." {n}Heinrix pauses, straining to hear something.{/n} "...if, that is, there is anyone left here to speak to."

languages.text: “但即便如此，我也必须利用这个机会。我要想办法弄清楚这个{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}工业世界{/g}，尤其是充满了神圣机器与{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}仆人的这颗行星上，究竟有什么东西让那些邪教徒特别感兴趣。首先，得先找到能告诉我们这里发生了什么事情的人……”{n}海因里希顿了顿，努力地听着什么。{/n}“……前提是，假如这里还有正常人的话。”
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, I must use this opportunity and try to determine what the cult was doing on an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} and what specifically interested them on a planet full of sacred machines and servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. First, we must find someone who can tell us what's been going on here..." {n}Heinrix pauses, straining to hear something.{/n} "...if, that is, there is anyone left here to speak to."

traits.locale_text: “但即便如此，我也必须利用这个机会。我要想办法弄清楚这个工业世界，尤其是充满了神圣机器与{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}仆人的这颗行星上，究竟有什么东西让那些邪教徒特别感兴趣。首先，得先找到能告诉我们这里发生了什么事情的人……”{n}海因里希顿了顿，努力地听着什么。{/n}“……前提是，假如这里还有正常人的话。”

languages.text: «No obstante, debo aprovechar esta oportunidad para tratar de determinar el propósito del Culto en un {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}mundo industrial{/g} y lo que ha podido despertar su interés en un planeta lleno de máquinas y sirvientes sagrados del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Primero, tenemos que encontrar a alguien que pueda explicarnos lo que está ocurriendo aquí...». {n}Heinrix hace una pausa, tratando de oír algo.{/n} «... Suponiendo, por supuesto, que quede alguien a quien preguntar».
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, I must use this opportunity and try to determine what the cult was doing on an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} and what specifically interested them on a planet full of sacred machines and servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. First, we must find someone who can tell us what's been going on here..." {n}Heinrix pauses, straining to hear something.{/n} "...if, that is, there is anyone left here to speak to."

traits.locale_text: «No obstante, debo aprovechar esta oportunidad para tratar de determinar el propósito del Culto en un mundo industrial y lo que ha podido despertar su interés en un planeta lleno de máquinas y sirvientes sagrados del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Primero, tenemos que encontrar a alguien que pueda explicarnos lo que está ocurriendo aquí...». {n}Heinrix hace una pausa, tratando de oír algo.{/n} «... Suponiendo, por supuesto, que quede alguien a quien preguntar».

languages.text: 「いずれにせよ、この機会を利用して、教団が{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}で何をしていたのか、神聖な機械や{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の奴隷がたくさんいる惑星で何に特に興味を持ったのかを突き止めなければなりません。まずはここで何が起こっているのかを教えてくれる人を見つけなければ…」{n}ハインリックスは立ち止まり、何かを聞き取ろうとする。{/n}「…もし、ここに話せる人が残っていればの話ですが」
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, I must use this opportunity and try to determine what the cult was doing on an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} and what specifically interested them on a planet full of sacred machines and servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. First, we must find someone who can tell us what's been going on here..." {n}Heinrix pauses, straining to hear something.{/n} "...if, that is, there is anyone left here to speak to."

traits.locale_text: 「いずれにせよ、この機会を利用して、教団が{g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}産業惑星{/g}で何をしていたのか、神聖な機械や{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の奴隷がたくさんいる惑星で何に特に興味を持ったのかを突き止めなければなりません。まずはここで何が起こっているのかを教えてくれる人を見つけなければ…」{n}ハインリックスは立ち止まり、何かを聞き取ろうとする。{/n}「…もし、ここに話せる人が残っていればの話ですが」

languages.text: "Dennoch muss ich diese Gelegenheit nutzen und versuchen, zu ermitteln, was der Kult auf einer {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}Produktionswelt{/g} wollte, speziell auf einem Planeten voller heiliger Maschinen und Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Zunächst müssen wir jemanden finden, der uns sagen kann, was sich hier abgespielt hat ..." {n}Heinrix bricht ab und lauscht.{/n} "Falls es noch jemanden gibt, mit dem man sprechen kann."
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, I must use this opportunity and try to determine what the cult was doing on an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} and what specifically interested them on a planet full of sacred machines and servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. First, we must find someone who can tell us what's been going on here..." {n}Heinrix pauses, straining to hear something.{/n} "...if, that is, there is anyone left here to speak to."

traits.locale_text: "Dennoch muss ich diese Gelegenheit nutzen und versuchen, zu ermitteln, was der Kult auf einer Produktionswelt wollte, speziell auf einem Planeten voller heiliger Maschinen und Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Zunächst müssen wir jemanden finden, der uns sagen kann, was sich hier abgespielt hat ..." {n}Heinrix bricht ab und lauscht.{/n} "Falls es noch jemanden gibt, mit dem man sprechen kann."

languages.text: « Quoi qu'il en soit, je dois profiter de cette occasion pour essayer de déterminer ce que le Culte faisait ici et ce qui pouvait l'intéresser dans un {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}monde industriel{/g} rempli de machines sacrées et de serviteurs de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. Pour commencer, nous devons trouver quelqu'un qui pourra nous expliquer ce qu'il s'est passé ici... » {n}Heinrix s'interrompt et tend l'oreille.{/n} « Du moins, s'il reste quelqu'un à qui parler. »
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, I must use this opportunity and try to determine what the cult was doing on an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} and what specifically interested them on a planet full of sacred machines and servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. First, we must find someone who can tell us what's been going on here..." {n}Heinrix pauses, straining to hear something.{/n} "...if, that is, there is anyone left here to speak to."

traits.locale_text: « Quoi qu'il en soit, je dois profiter de cette occasion pour essayer de déterminer ce que le Culte faisait ici et ce qui pouvait l'intéresser dans un monde industriel rempli de machines sacrées et de serviteurs de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. Pour commencer, nous devons trouver quelqu'un qui pourra nous expliquer ce qu'il s'est passé ici... » {n}Heinrix s'interrompt et tend l'oreille.{/n} « Du moins, s'il reste quelqu'un à qui parler. »

languages.text: "Yine de bu fırsatı kullanıp tarikatın {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}sınai dünyada{/g} ne aradığını çözmem gerekiyor. Özellikle kutsal makinelerle ve {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} hizmetkârlarıyla dolu bir gezegenle neden ilgilendiklerini anlamalıyım. Öncelikle burada olup bitenleri bize anlatacak birini bulmalıyız..." {n}Heinrix, bir şey duyar gibi duraksıyor.{/n} "Tabii burada bizimle konuşacak biri kaldıysa."
languages.original_text: "Nevertheless, I must use this opportunity and try to determine what the cult was doing on an {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}industrial world{/g} and what specifically interested them on a planet full of sacred machines and servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. First, we must find someone who can tell us what's been going on here..." {n}Heinrix pauses, straining to hear something.{/n} "...if, that is, there is anyone left here to speak to."

traits.locale_text: "Yine de bu fırsatı kullanıp tarikatın {g|Encyclopedia:IndustrialWorld}sınai dünyada{/g} ne aradığını çözmem gerekiyor. Özellikle kutsal makinelerle ve {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} hizmetkârlarıyla dolu bir gezegenle neden ilgilendiklerini anlamalıyım. Öncelikle burada olup bitenleri bize anlatacak birini bulmalıyız..." {n}Heinrix, bir şey duyar gibi duraksıyor.{/n} "Tabii burada bizimle konuşacak biri kaldıysa."
